response.overview: A documentary about Cripple Bastards' history from 1988 to 2007 with interviews to the former members and a lot of rare, restored VHS footage showing the Bastards at their very beginning and riding thru the basic features that consolidated the band’s style and negative fame in the last decade. Interviews with the current members, a history of CB related to the many tours and festivals, reports and tips on each album and a huge part explaining/showing in detail how the band’s controversy and “assholism” has born and widespread all over the years.
response.title: Blackmails And Assholism
